row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! run book function to map network shared drive ! ! @echo off dir &UC4RB_DEVICE_NAME#\ set returncode=%errorlevel% if %returncode% EQU 0 ( echo Error - drive letter already in use. exit /b 1 )
:SET &KEYS# = "" :IF &UC4RB_DEVICE_NAME# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&UC4RB_DEVICE_NAME#" :ELSE GOTO ABEND :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SHARE_NAME# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# &UC4RB_SHARE_NAME#" :ELSE GOTO ABEND :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# &UC4RB_PASSWORD#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_USER# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# /USER:&UC4RB_USER#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_PERSISTENT# <> "" : SET &KEYS# = "&KEYS# /PERSISTENT:&UC4RB_PERSISTENT#" :ENDIF
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" ARB -cmd execute "%SYSTEMROOT%\system32\net.exe" use &KEYS# set returncode=%errorlevel% if %returncode% EQU 0 ( echo Share mapped successfully ) else ( echo Error occurred whilst mapping share exit /b %returncode% ) dir &UC4RB_DEVICE_NAME#\ set returncode=%errorlevel% if %returncode% EQU 0 ( echo Check share - passed ) else ( echo Error occurred whilst checking share ) exit /b %returncode% :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
